00022 void CustomerManagement::newCustomer(Customer customer)
00023 {
00024     QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00025     fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00026     fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE prIdCustomer= :custId");
00027     fetchquery.bindValue(":custId",customer.getId());
00028     fetchquery.exec();
00029 
00030     while(fetchquery.next())
00031     {
00032         QMessageBox::information(0,"Input Data Error","This ID exists");
00033         return;
00034     }
00035 
00036     if(CustomerManagement::checkInData(customer))
00037        {
00038          QSqlQuery query;
00039          query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00040          query.prepare("INSERT INTO Customers (prIdCustomer,CustomerName,CustomerSurname,GroupId)"
00041                                           "VALUES(:custId, :custName, :custSurname, :groupId)");
00042          query.bindValue(":custId", customer.getId());
00043          query.bindValue(":custName",customer.getName());
00044          query.bindValue(":custSurname",customer.getSurname());
00045          query.bindValue(":groupId",customer.getGroupId());
00046          query.exec();
00047         }
00048 }

00056 void CustomerManagement::editCustomer(Customer customer)
00057 {
00058      QSqlQuery query;
00059      QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00060 
00061      fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00062      fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM RoomsReservation WHERE fkCustomerId= :custId");
00063      fetchquery.bindValue(":custId",customer.getId());
00064      fetchquery.exec();
00065 
00066      fetchquery.next();
00067      if(fetchquery.isValid())
00068         {
00069             QMessageBox::information(0,"Input Data Error","This customer can't be edited.Reservation in progress");
00070         }
00071      else
00072          {
00073              query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00074              query.prepare("UPDATE Customers SET CustomerName=:custName, CustomerSurname=:custSurname ,GroupId=:custGroupId WHERE prIdCustomer=:custId");
00075              query.bindValue(":custId",customer.getId());
00076              query.bindValue(":custName",customer.getName());
00077              query.bindValue(":custSurname",customer.getSurname());
00078              query.bindValue(":custGroupId",customer.getGroupId());
00079              query.exec();
00080          }

00091 void CustomerManagement::deleteCustomer(Customer customer)
00092 {
00093      QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00094      QSqlQuery query;
00095 
00096     fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00097     fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM RoomsReservation WHERE fkCustomerId= :custId");
00098     fetchquery.bindValue(":custId",customer.getId());
00099     fetchquery.exec();
00100 
00101     fetchquery.next();
00102     if(fetchquery.isValid())
00103         {
00104            QMessageBox::information(0,"Input Data Error","This customer can't be deleted.Reservation in progress");
00105         }
00106     else
00107         {
00108             query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00109             query.prepare("delete from Customers where prIdCustomer= :custId");
00110             query.bindValue(":custId",customer.getId());
00111             query.exec();
00112         }
00113 }

00124 Customer CustomerManagement::fetchCustomer(QString id)
00125 {
00126     QSqlQuery fetchquery;
00127     QString customername,customersurname, cid ("");
00128     int groupid = 0;
00129     Customer customer;
00130     fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00131     fetchquery.prepare("SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE prIdCustomer= :custId");
00132     fetchquery.bindValue(":custId",id);
00133     fetchquery.exec();
00134 
00135     while (fetchquery.next())
00136     {
00137          cid = fetchquery.value(0).toString();
00138      customername = fetchquery.value(1).toString();
00139      customersurname = fetchquery.value(2).toString();
00140      groupid = fetchquery.value(3).toInt();
00141     }
00142     customer.setId(cid);
00143     customer.setName(customername);
00144     customer.setSurname(customersurname);
00145     customer.setGroupId(groupid);
00146 
00147     return customer;
00148 }

00162 
00163     fetchquery = sqlMechanism.myQuery();

00165     fetchquery.exec();
00170     while(fetchquery.next())
00171     {
00172         customer.setId(fetchquery.value(0).toString());
00173         customer.setName(fetchquery.value(1).toString());
00174         customer.setSurname(fetchquery.value(2).toString());
00175         customer.setGroupId(fetchquery.value(3).toInt());
00176 
00177         custVector.push_back(customer);
00178     }
00179 
00180     return custVector;
00181 
00182 }

00194     Customer customer;
00195     vector<Customer> custVector;
00196

00200     //fetchquery.bindValue(":value",value);
00201     //fetchquery.exec();

00204     {

00207         customer.setSurname(fetchquery.value(2).toString());

00242                     ret = true;

00246            QMessageBox::warning(0,"Input Data Error","Check the Customer Id");

00249

00251         {
00252

00255         }
00256         else {
00257              QMessageBox::warning(0,"Input Data Error","Check the Customer Name");
00258                         ret = false;
00259         }

00262             {

00264             }
